title: Blockbuster Plots- Before the Next Draft [Epub & Mobi] [Stor
description:
Blockbuster Plots: Before the Next Draft: 26 Plot Steps to Revision Plot
Author: Martha Alderson
Published: 2009
Publisher: Illusion Press
ASIN: B006ICYYFG
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

Blockbuster Plots, Before the Next Draft eBook is designed for novelists, screenwriters, and memoirists who are ready to push aside the words to reveal the deeper plot and structure of your story. This eBook is for anyone who wishes to re-vision a draft of your story with an eye on plot and structure. Follow step-by-step the 26 plot steps to produce superior plots.

Before the Next Draft eBook offers concrete tips for revisioning your story by creating complex characters, compelling dramatic action and rich thematic details and depth.

The ebook is filled with visual aides that "show" how to create plot at the overall story level and the scene level.

Includes:

Character Emotional Development Profile form
The 7 Key Scenes in Every Great Story
Developing Thematic Significance
Plot Planner template with "above" and "below" scene descriptions
Essential elements for the Beginning, the Middle, and the End of your novel, screenplay, and memoir
Cause and Effect
Creating Dramatic Action
